channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- gAppointments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- gAppointments

item.title: CVE-2023-2707|2024-07-11T15:15:33.489Z -- unknown -- gappointments
item.description: The gAppointments WordPress plugin through 1.9.5.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
